name: Crazy Xtreme Bike: Hill CLimb
description:
Crazy Xtreme Bike: Hill CLimb is the best off road motorcycle racer game with insane and stunt action. You must perform a killer stunts with powerful Sports bike by doing risky jump over the uphills that are a real hill climber.Driving an Extreme MotorCycle on dangerous mountain tracks which are impossible as the obstacles and hurdles are very hard to overcome.
FEATURES
Stunning,awesome graphics
zigzag hilly roads
Smooth & realistic bike controls
